sqlReaderQuery.value: if object_id ('dbo.TopNfiles') is NULL create table dbo.TopNfiles(itemName varchar(20), lastModifedDatetime datetime); insert into dbo.TopNfiles select '@{activity('Get Metadata2').output.itemName}','@{formatDateTime(activity('Get Metadata2').output.lastModified,'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss')}'; select 1 as output;
SELECT TOP 3 * from TopNfiles order by desc;

INSERT INTO dbo.countoffiles SELECT '@{item().name}', '@{int(activity('Countnumber').output.ItemsCount)}';
SELECT 1 as output

SELECT * FROM dbo.FactBookings
WHERE booking_date > '@{activity('Last Load').output.firstRow.lastload}'
AND booking_date <= '@{activity('Latest Load').output.firstRow.latestload}'

SELECT max(booking_date) as latestload
FROM dbo.FactBookings;

SELECT TABLE_SCHEMA, TABLE_NAME FROM information_schema.TABLES
WHERE TABLE_SCHEMA = 'dbo';
